File Translate

You can easily translate texts from your project’s resource file by making a POST request to /file/translate/. Please note that previously translated, unchanged items won’t be re-translated. All new and changed items will be translated.

Method: GET/POST

URL: https://transfluent.com/v2/file/translate/

Parameters:

callback_url

comment

target_languages

level [=3]

identifier

language

token

Returns:

with status OK: 

{"status":"OK","response":{"word_count":87,"ordered_word_count":12}}
